articles.title: Former Mass. high school wrestling coach convicted of attempting to send obscene material to minor

articles.title: 2 mpox cases confirmed in Worcester as Mass. health officials warn of ‘concerning’ uptick
articles.description:
As of Dec. 1, there have been 51 confirmed mpox cases in Massachusetts this year, with 37 of those cases occurring between Aug. 1 and Dec. 1.
